name: Mined If I Break
description:
Goal:
A minecart racing game without steering where you control your speed helped by a magnetic grappling hook. The goal is to reach the finish line as fast as possible while keeping most of your gold.

Your magnetic grappling hook will help you to slow down your minecart and prevent your gold to fall. You can use it on signboard and other metallic surfaces.

Control:
- Left click to launch hook on signpost and hold to stay hooked and slow your cart. If you stay hooked and are too far from the signpost, the rope will break and you will have to wait for a few seconds to fire it, so you need to release soon enough! Rope is going from green to red to feedback the rope length.

- Escape to restart

- Alt+F4 to quit the game (sorry about that ><)

Known issues:
- Broken gold system making the game harder than intended and score not consistent
- End game (when the camera stops following the cart) : Leaderboard and score (time and gold related) are not displayed
- Sound glitch at the beginning if going too slow
- Some signs are missing, some are misplaced
- Fullscreen on some hardware can make the game slower, try launching it in windowed

We are hard at work to improve the game and to make it better, we'll submit new versions after the jam !
